mapper.insert: insert into mark (r_id, t_id, score, comment) values (#{r_id}, #{t_id}, #{score}, #{comment});
mapper.select: select laboratory.l_id, score, laboratory.name, attend_score, proportion from laboratory, report, mark, operates where c_id=#{c_id} and operates.s_id=#{s_id} and laboratory.l_id=report.l_id and report.r_id=mark.r_id and operates.l_id=laboratory.l_id and operates.s_id=report.s_id;
select name from student where s_id=#{s_id};
